commit message: Small fix, mostly to test of my new installation works..
Reliability fixes, it should now properly handle errors when saving.
Various fixes for stability, notifications, error handling.
Create a .nomedia file when creating folder for storage, to prevent the media scanner from picking up images from saved pages.
Various stability + performance fixes, now also show the favicon of webpage in the ui, needs more work.

Refactored displayAdapter.java, less bugs, use Picasso for image loading, fixes strange bug where the thumbnails / icons would somehow get messed up when scrolling, fix the layout section of preferences (better text  / wording), make the default choice of layout correct for small screens, remove the list layout with large thumbnail and text, as it is obsolete, various other fixes.
Fix text size for small / large screens, use OKhttp's cache for better performance, fix that the 'save in progress' was not ongoing (sticky) even though it was supposed to be.
Use enums where they should be used.. DisplayAdapted.java now has code which is a little less horrible. Various other fixes too.
Refactored various things and improved the code.
Bump version number one more time..
